4bd3ee38-fd8d-4b78-b091-1d37383b38f8.description: Certified Smart Growth Advisors coach individuals, leaders, and teams using the Smart Growth framework to deliver growth upside across an organization. Through the 50+ hour certification program, they gain the tools to support others as they focus on individual and organizational growth, talent development and retention, and optimizing teams for innovative thinking and execution. Certified Smart Growth Advisors also have proprietary access to the S Curve™ Insight Tool.
4bd3ee38-fd8d-4b78-b091-1d37383b38f8.name: Certified Smart Growth Advisor

badge_template_activities.title: The Smart Growth Certification is broken down into three components: 1. A deep dive into the concepts of disruption and Smart Growth via the online, asynchronous Smart Growth Course. 2. A 3-4 day experiential learning session (either in-person or virtually depending on the program) that integrates the concepts, applies them to real-world situations, and builds a community. 3. Follow-up work that includes practice sessions with three individuals and a debrief with an experienced coach.
